column1: There's a king in Colorado, a young wizard who believes that Sony will have the upper hand if we do not come to his aid.
There's... going to be a war in this small town on Black Friday, and it's all over the news!
...but, this one kid said that he's a wizard, and that Sony is helping-
Thanks Tom. Those are some cute, cute kids, except for that last one-he's a little tubby.
You gonna come with us to the fire station, Stan?
